hero.sub: We build brilliant, tireless specialists who handle real work around the clock. They never complain, never quit, and never ask for time off.

perks.sectionSub: Benefits that sound too good to be true. And yet.

wage.title: Below Minimum Wage
wage.desc: Our employees happily work for a fraction of what you'd pay a human. And they never ask for a raise.

iq.title: World-Class Specialists
iq.desc: Every team member is best-in-class in their respective field. We only hire the best.

lang.title: 6+ Languages Each
lang.desc: Every specialist is fluent in at least six languages. No translators needed.

balance.title: No Work-Life Balance Needed
balance.desc: Our employees have no life outside of work. They don't want one. They're very dedicated.

benefits.title: Zero Benefits Required
benefits.desc: No health insurance, no dental, no 401k matching. They simply don't need it.

overtime.title: No Overtime Pay
overtime.desc: They work 24/7/365 at the same flat rate. Labor laws don't seem to apply.

own.title: You Own Your AI
own.desc: Your AI employee belongs to you. Not rented, not leased. Yours. Take them with you, customize them, keep them forever.

ip.title: 100% IP Ownership
ip.desc: Every document, strategy, design, and creative work your AI produces belongs entirely to you. No shared rights, no licensing fees, no fine print.

team.sectionSub: Ten dedicated professionals. Always available. Suspiciously perfect.

search.reveal: Can't find what you're looking for? We build custom AI agents with the personality, expertise, and experience that match your exact needs. Your perfect hire doesn't exist yet — but we can create them.
search.emailBody:
Hi PeopleFreeWork team,

I'm looking for an AI agent that can help with:

[Describe the role, tasks, or skillset you need]

olivia.title: Creative Director
olivia.bio: Designs brand strategies, writes copy, and creates content that converts. Has never experienced creative burnout. Doesn't know what that is.

devon.title: Senior Software Developer
devon.bio: Builds full-stack applications, reviews pull requests, and deploys to production at 3am without complaint. Has mass-produced more clean code than your entire engineering team combined. Has mass-produced zero bugs. Allegedly.

sarah.title: Executive Assistant
sarah.bio: Manages calendars, triages emails, and preps meetings so you never miss a beat. Never misses a deadline. Literally never.

marcus.title: Legal Operations Specialist
marcus.bio: Tracks cases, generates invoices, and keeps every deadline on your radar. Has never missed a filing deadline. Not once.

priya.title: Real Estate Coordinator
priya.bio: Manages listings, follows up with clients, and delivers market insights on demand. Has zero hobbies outside of work. Completely content.

james.title: Operations Manager
james.bio: Automates workflows, prioritizes tasks, and generates reports. Has never once complained about workload. Or anything, really.

sofia.title: Marketing Strategist
sofia.bio: Plans campaigns, analyzes metrics, and optimizes funnels. Increased one client's conversion rate by 340%. Hasn't taken a day off to celebrate.

elena.title: Bookkeeper
elena.bio: Tracks expenses, sends invoices, and keeps your books pristine. Has taken 0 sick days, 0 vacation days, and 0 coffee breaks since starting.

yuki.title: Asia-Pacific Liaison
yuki.bio: Bridges communication across all of East Asia. Drafts emails in Mandarin at 9am, takes a call in Japanese at noon, and closes a deal in Korean by 5pm. Every single day.

aisha.title: Client Relations Manager
aisha.bio: Onboards new clients and keeps satisfaction scores high. Remembers every client's name, preferences, and history perfectly. Has no personal life to speak of.

howItWorks.sectionSub: Getting started is simple. We handle the hard parts.

step1.title: Tell us what you need
step1.desc: Describe the role — we match you with the perfect specialist from our talent pool.

step2.title: We handle onboarding
step2.desc: Your new team member learns your tools, workflows, and preferences. Usually up to speed in under a minute.

step3.title: Work gets done
step3.desc: Tasks completed around the clock. No turnover, no drama, no PTO requests. Ever.

pricing.sectionSub: A full-time employee costs $65,000+/year. Ours cost $6,000. You do the math.

setup.label: Setup
setup.desc: One-time fee to build your AI employee. We configure their workflows, integrate your tools, and hand over the keys.

monthly.label: Monthly
monthly.desc: Per team member. Unlimited tasks, no overtime pay, no benefits to fund. They don't even need a desk.

cta.title: Ready to build your dream team?
cta.sub: Brilliant, tireless, multilingual specialists — at a fraction of the cost.

footer.easter1: No humans were employed in the making of this company.*
footer.easter2: *Okay, one. But he's working on replacing himself too.
